Texts.Chs: 一群名叫^orange;Wrexor Nar^reset;的海盗，最近一直在骚扰外围星系，破坏新殖民地的稳定。你能干杀掉他们拯救大家吗？
Texts.Eng: A nasty pirate named ^orange;Wrexor Nar^reset; has been harassing outer-rim systems of late and destabilizing new colonies. Can you please kill him to save countless lives?

Texts.Chs: 把^green;暴风守护者^reset;带到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Stormwarden^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 知道人类幸存者的殖民船不会再被那疯子袭击后，我可以放心休息了！
Texts.Eng: I can rest easier now, knowing that colony ships carrying human survivors will no longer be attacked by that madman!
